text: man i cant wait for this movie!....Paul mccartney tells a story in the "band on the run" book  The story is that Paul and Linda went to visit Brian at his home in california..., they knocked for over an hour but Brian never answered...They could hear Brian hiding  and crying quietly..Eventually the mccartneys left..Brian was really "Burnt out" for a period in the mid 70s!

text: Impossible to judge a film on just a trailer. Whether or not these are strong enough character actors to pull off such a complex personality is yet to be seen. The soundtrack and story line is just as important. Deviation from actuality will ruin an important story that is uniquely American. While the soundtrack alone should be a two hour delight, it's hard to know if anyone can play Brian Wilson.
